title: Gorse fire on Glenshane Pass
description: Drone footage of mile-long blaze in the Sperrins
content:
The scale of the massive gorse fire near the Glenshane Pass in County Londonderry becomes clear thanks to drone footage.

Mark Smyth, Group Commander for the Northern Ireland Fire & Rescue Service (NIFRS), says it is believed the fire was started by "human error".

He says it has been one of NIFRS' most difficult incidents. Thanks to Kevin McCloskey for the footage.
